text: Xa ke iiNyanga eziNgcwele zigqithile, babulaleni abakhonzi bezithixo naphi na apho nibafumana khona, nibabambe nibathimbe, nibancathamele kuzo zonke iindawo zokuncathamela. Kodwa ukuba bayaguquka, benze iSalâh, banikele ngeZakâh, bayekeni nisuke endleleni yabo. Inene uAllâh nguMxoleli uSozinceba
